sentences.english: But it has exploded in popularity, as this stage is the most vulnerable for the mayfly .
sentences.chinese: 但爆炸的人氣，作爲現階段最脆弱的蜉蝣。

sentences.english: The mayfly is to trout fly fishing, what the microchip is to the personal computer.
sentences.chinese: 鱒魚是飛的蜉蝣，什麼是個人電腦晶片。

sentences.english: After what you've said about 'Ephemera' I must be silent.
sentences.chinese: 在你說了關於蜉蝣的那些話之後我只好閉嘴了。

sentences.english: Mayfly, you must be so sad.
The oak tree blessed the mayfly for the last time.
sentences.chinese: 橡樹祝福最後一次蜉蝣。
蜉蝣，有一個幸福的夢想。

sentences.english: And I am the bird that swoops down to swallow the mayfly .
sentences.chinese: 我也是在大地春回及時前來掠食蜉蝣的鳥。

sentences.english: Millions upon millions of mayflies take to the air for a single devastating act to mate and then die.
sentences.chinese: 數以百萬計的蜉蝣飛向空中，執行一項致命任務。

sentences.english: We now will cover the adult phases of the mayfly .
sentences.chinese: 我們現在將涵蓋成年階段的蜉蝣。

sentences.english: Oh , yes , man , the latest of the ephemera.
sentences.chinese: 哦，對了，人呀，最後的蜉蝣。

sentences.english: Is that they make great general all-purpose mayfly attractor patterns.
sentences.chinese: 他們一般是大全能蜉蝣吸引花紋。

sentences.english: Other technologies have come and gone like mayflies.
sentences.chinese: 其它技術就像蜉蝣一樣匆匆的出現又死亡。

sentences.english: In this dream, the oak tree met the mayfly.
sentences.chinese: 在這個夢想，橡樹符合蜉蝣。

sentences.english: The oak tree and the mayfly kept on talking to each other.
sentences.chinese: 橡樹和蜉蝣不斷的互相交談。

sentences.english: Once mayfly larvae are found, they will be removed.
sentences.chinese: 一旦蜉蝣幼蟲被發現，它們就會被去除。

sentences.english: The oak tree was very pleased indeed to see the mayfly.
sentences.chinese: 櫟樹的確很高興地看到蜉蝣。

definition: lit. born in the morning and dying at dusk (idiom)/fig. ephemeral/transient
Platypleura kaempferi, a kind of cicada
to float/to drift/to wander/variant of 蜉蝣[fu2 you2]
insect or insect-like small creature (literary)/base person (used as a curse word)
fry (newly hatched fish)/legendary giant fish that could transform into a giant bird 鵬|鹏[Peng2]
(bird species of China) brambling (Fringilla montifringilla)/(fig.) small fry
(bird species of China) Eurasian wren (Troglodytes troglodytes)
